articles.description: Howard Wang, head of Greater China equities at JPMorgan Asset Management, said Chinese tech companies have the potential to grow over the long term.
articles.content:
JPMorgan Asset Management is bullish on Chinese technology stocks even though regulators are cracking down on internet giants in the mainland.
Shares of major Chinese tech companies such as Alibaba,… [+1742 chars]
